title: Show total acceptance criteria count in Ralph output
description: When Ralph displays a story, it should show the total number of acceptance criteria (e.g., '0/12 criteria checked') so users know the scope of the story at a glance.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Find where Ralph displays story info (likely in iteration loop)
Add criteria count: total = jq '.acceptanceCriteria | length'
Add checked count: checked = jq '[.acceptanceCriteria[] | select(.checked==true)] | length'
Display format: 'Criteria: X/Y checked' or similar
Test: Run Ralph on a story, verify criteria count is shown
